author: VinInn
body:
In both (grouped)limitedCandidates for each "step" candidates are first all collected and then the size is reduced based on some score.
This is equivalent to not "pushing" a new candidate if worse than the current worst once the collection has reached the max allowed size. (but for candidates with equal score)

It should also be noticed that the final sorting is not required and indeed in groupedLimitedCandidates there is NO final sort.

We also  Reduced the Size of TempTrajectory to speed up move and swap.
Took the opportunity to reduce the size of Trajectory as well.
and to cleanup  general CkfTrajectoryBuilder code.

In a HLT menu
time of limitedCandidates improves of 20%
while the one of groupedLimitedCandidates improves of a bit more of 10%

HLT throughput improves of a solid 1.5% at least.

Purely technical.  Some regression may appear in case of "candidates" with identical score.
title: Speedup handling of (Temp)Trajectory by reducing their size
